history.first: In 1983, 5 lesbian feminist activists got together and launched
history.fourth: We support them with the resources they need as they challenge power, push for lasting change and clear the way for future generations.
history.second: Mama Cash - a pioneering force for resourcing feminist movements worldwide.
history.third: It wasn’t always easy, it wasn’t always popular. But here we are four decades later, and Mama Cash is moving more resources than ever before - to women, girls, and trans and intersex activists around the world.
